content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the fraction 1 over x, end fraction, times the cosine of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>⋅</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the sine of x, and denominator x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 1 minus x squared, times the sine of x, and denominator x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the negative of cosine of x, minus x times the sine of x, and denominator x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the negative of cosine of x, plus x times the sine of x, and denominator x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the negative of cosine of x, minus x times the sine of x, and denominator x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
